backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend that includes blob storage and authorization mixins, and implements CRUD operations for user profiles, announcements, Juma collections, and contact inquiries with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with Hindi language attribute, page title and meta description referencing Masjid-e-Ghousia Welfare Committee in Jaunpur.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections in order, manages admin panel open state, conditionally renders ProfileSetupModal for new users, and wraps everything in a React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying four value cards and a mission panel with an Islamic quote; stat counters in the mission panel are all set to zero.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel overlay component with tabbed interface for managing announcements, Juma collections, and contact inquiries, including add/delete forms with feedback messages and formatted date/currency display.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementsSec: Displays a grid of announcements fetched via `useGetAnnouncements`, with loading, error, and empty states, formatting dates in Hindi locale.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with static contact info cards and a validated inquiry form that submits via `useSubmitInquiry`, showing success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/DecorativePatter: A simple presentational component that renders a full-cover geometric pattern image with configurable opacity as an absolutely-positioned overlay.
frontend/src/components/DonateSection.ts: Shows a donation section with copyable bank transfer details and placeholder impact statistics, using a decorative background pattern.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with branding, smooth-scroll navigation links, contact details, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution badge.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a photo gallery grid for 'Salana Jalsa 2026' with a keyboard-navigable lightbox supporting prev/next and Escape controls.
frontend/src/components/GeometricDivider: A simple presentational component that renders a full-width decorative section-divider image with a max height of 80px.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with logo, Hindi nav links, smooth scroll, login button, and a conditional admin panel button shown only to authenticated admins.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with mosque background image, Bismillah text, committee logo, Hindi tagline, and smooth-scroll CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/JamaCollectionSe: Displays Juma (Friday) donation collection records fetched from the backend, with a total amount banner and loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that handles Internet Identity login/logout, clears the React Query cache on logout, and shows a loading spinner during login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves the profile via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation.
Renders a grid of nine welfare services (education, medical, housing, etc.) offered by the committee, each with an icon, title, and description in Hindi.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating the caller's user profile, role, and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on announcements, Juma collections, and contact inquiries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind, imports Devanagari/Arabic fonts, defines a warm ivory/orange/gold color palette via CSS custom properties, and provides reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with a custom color palette (ivory, champagne, orange, gold, forest), Devanagari/Arabic font families, custom shadows, and accordion/fade-in animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and pending feature requests, noting that an admin panel link needs to be added to the hamburger menu for authenticated admin users in the Header component.
